revision.text: peptide Amide derived from two or more amino carboxylic acid molecules (the same or different) by formation of a covalent bond from the carbonyl carbon of one to the nitrogen atom of another with formal loss of water. The term is usually applied to structures formed from alpha-amino acids, but it includes those derived from any amino carboxylic acid. X = OH, OR, NH2, NHR, etc. {{ #viki:pageTitles=peptide}}[http://localhost/mediawiki-1.34.1/index.php/macromolecule is a subclass from macromolecule ]
